data.message: Hi.. I need a help badly regarding recovery of fb account... pls, its really very urgent..

replies.message: Hi Dilshad. You can learn how to remove or recover an old account you can't log into here: https://www.facebook.com/help/231208473756221. Please keep in mind that it's against our Community Standards to maintain more than one personal account. -Jessica

Hello Jessica.

First of all,thank you for your reply.
All required documents are submitted on 15th April & facebook replied in mail that they are reviewing the account named সামাউন খালিদ কলিন্স( Samaun Khalid Collins)...
Its been 10days now...Got no reply till today...

IT IS VERY URGENT TO GET BACK THAT REAL ID...

Seeking your kind help....
